mapper.insert: insert into connect (applydate, who, momno, sitterno) values (now(), #{who}, #{momno}, #{sitterno})
mapper.select:
select m.memberno as memberno, mi.momno as momno, name, FLOOR( (CAST(REPLACE(current_date,'-','') AS unsigned) - CAST(REPLACE(birthdate,'-','') as unsigned)) / 10000 ) + 2 AS birthdate, payment, applydate, phone, accept, deny_type from connect conn
inner join mom_info mi on mi.momno = conn.momno inner join sitter_info si on si.sitterno = conn.sitterno
inner join member m on m.memberno=mi.memberno
where si.memberno=#{memberno}

select m.memberno as memberno, si.sitterno as sitterno, name, FLOOR( (CAST(REPLACE(current_date,'-','') AS unsigned) - CAST(REPLACE(birthdate,'-','') as unsigned)) / 10000 ) + 2 AS birthdate, si.payment, applydate, phone, accept, deny_type from connect conn inner join mom_info mi on mi.momno = conn.momno inner join sitter_info si on si.sitterno = conn.sitterno inner join member m on m.memberno=mi.memberno where mi.memberno=#{memberno};

select conn.cntno as cntno, m.memberno as memberno, conn.sitterno as sitterno, mi.momno as momno, name, FLOOR( (CAST(REPLACE(current_date,'-','') AS unsigned) - CAST(REPLACE(birthdate,'-','') as unsigned)) / 10000 ) + 2 AS birthdate, mi.payment, applydate, phone, accept, deny_type from connect conn inner join mom_info mi on mi.momno = conn.momno inner join sitter_info si on si.sitterno = conn.sitterno inner join member m on m.memberno=mi.memberno where si.memberno=#{memberno};
mapper.update: update connect set accept=#{accept}, deny_type=#{deny_type} where momno=#{momno}
